subject: Women's British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer traveled all night Monday to arrive at the Women’s British Open, distancing herself from her recent loss to Jiyai Shin in the longest playoff between two goflers in L.P.G.A. history.
snippet: Paula Creamer traveled all night Monday to arrive at the Women’s British Open, distancing herself from her recent loss to Jiyai Shin in the longest playoff between two goflers in L.P.G.A. history.
